Detailed Description

Used to Initialize the Emac Driver Instance at time of emac_open.

TThis configuration structure is used to initialize the Emac Driver Instance. This configuration information is passed while opening the DRV instance

Field Documentation

EMAC_ALLOC_PKT_CALLBACK_FN_T* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::alloc_pkt_cb

EMAC allocate packet call back function

void* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::appPrivate

DEPRECATED: Application specific handle, not used by driver

EMAC_FREE_PKT_CALLBACK_FN_T* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::free_pkt_cb

EMAC free packet call back function

void* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::hwAttrs

Pointer to a driver specific hardware attributes structure

bool EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::loop_back

True: packets loop back

bool EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::master_core_flag

True: master core configuration

uint32_t EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::max_pkt_size

Maximum size of the packet in bytes

bool EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::mdio_flag

True: configure MDIO

uint32_t EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::mode_of_operation

Default Keystone 3 only settting: for receive packet is interrupt mode (0), can set to poll mode (1)

uint32_t EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::num_of_chans

Total number of TX/RX channels configured for this core, only applicable for SOC_C6657

uint32_t EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::num_of_rx_pkt_desc

Total # of pkt desc initialized for all the RX chans in RX queues

uint32_t EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::num_of_tx_pkt_desc

Total # of pkt desc initialized for all the TX chans in TX queues

EMAC_CHAN_MAC_ADDR_T* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::p_chan_mac_addr

Application needs to provide the MAC address configurations; EMAC driver will allocate the channels if available and return the channel info to the application

uint32_t EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::phy_addr

Physical layer transceiver address mapped to the EMAC port valid address range is 0 - (EMAC_MAX_NUM_PHY_ADDR-1). if a valid address is specified, EMAC driver will check the link status only on the application specifid phy address; if an invalid phy_addr is specified, EMAC driver will search the phy address that can be used by itself

EMAC_RX_MGMT_CALLBACK_FN_T* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::rx_mgmt_response_cb

EMAC receive call back function for management response from ICSSG FW

EMAC_RX_PKT_CALLBACK_FN_T* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::rx_pkt_cb

EMAC RX call back function

EMAC_TX_TS_CALLBACK_FN_T* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::tx_ts_cb

EMAC transmit timestamp response callback function

void* EMAC_OpenConfigInfo_s::udmaHandle

Handle to UDMA driver
